fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose a player to paripapparapappapparappa each night. You'll deal a Paripapparapappapparappowerful attack to them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: *Overloaded* â€” If a player misspells this role's name or refers to it by something other than its name in any in-game channel, the next night, you may have your ability target every player in the game. (Referring to this role as "it" when it's already been brought up and it's clear what "it" refer to doesn't count.)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Paripapparapappapparappa all who would oppose you.
